title: Still haven't received RP.
body:
This is beyond ridiculous now Riot. I've waited 3 days for my RP, I've tried to stay patient but now it's starting to annoy me. Your only responses are "contact support", they tell me to wait. Which I have. For three days. You said you rolled the update back and refunded people who's codes didn't work, yet me (and many others on the forums) clearly haven't received their RP. It's not the wait that annoys me so much, it's the fact that I'm scared I won't get my RP at all.

On a side note; is there anyone who has actually received their RP at all? Because I see plenty who are still waiting, but none who've said they got their's refunded.

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should've received the RP owed, however there have been a few exceptions. If you're still yet to receive your RP you'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will resolve the issue for you.
..one of my ticket is saying that give ur gift card number, i did, but they did nothing to my account
nah mate, still waiting. All my tickets are "SOLVED" apparently
